channel.title: Spawn points?
channel.description:
I just downloaded epicscape v1 source and i went on the server to see what it looked like. I spawned in edge. When i pressed the home teletab it took me to another place. I need to make that place i went to the spawn point for new users. i know its something to do with the cords but i cant find the file i need to change them in. please help? sorry im a noob lol i know it must be simple to everyone on here lol
so in conclusion lol i need to change the place people spawn whenthey first log in

item.title: Spawn points?
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

thanks for the reply lol i dont quite understand butill give it a try lol[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 08, 2009, 02:00:37 pm[/size][hr]case 9540: // Home Teletab (Silabs)
{
deleteItem(9540, getItemSlot(9540), 1);
startAnimation(1816);
teleportToX = 2515;
teleportToY = 3863;
txt4 = “You teleport to home”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}
break;

is the 9540 thing it?

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn points?
item.dc:creator: @do_or_die do or die
item.description:
@do_or_die wrote:

u need to find the tab id use that id in the cient.java then search for the tab id in there.
;D
